trans-unit.source: Adds settings that define behavior to a custom data service.
trans-unit.target: Legger til innstillinger som definerer atferd til en egendefinert datatjeneste.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether requests with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_$count" name="$count" href=""></xref> path segment or the <xref uid="langword_csharp_$inlinecount" name="$inlinecount" href=""></xref> query options are accepted.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om forespørsler med den <xref uid="langword_csharp_$count" name="$count" href=""> </xref> banen segmentet eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_$inlinecount" name="$inlinecount" href=""> </xref> Spørringsalternativer godtas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if count requests are supported; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis antallet forespørsler støttes. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether projection requests should be accepted.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om projeksjonen forespørsler som skal godkjennes.

trans-unit.source: Projection requests are made by using the `$select` query option.
trans-unit.target: Projeksjonen-forespørsler ved hjelp av den `$select` spørring alternativet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if projection requests are supported; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis projeksjonen forespørsler støttes. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Allow replace functions in the request url.
trans-unit.target: Tillat erstatte funksjoner i forespørselen URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether to invoke change interceptors when a link is deleted.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om å aktivere endre interceptors når en kobling slettes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when interceptors should be invoked; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Boolean>verdi som <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> når interceptors skal startet; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum protocol version that is supported by the response sent by the data service.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den maksimale protokollversjonen som støttes av responsen fra vertstjenesten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Services.Common.DataServiceProtocolVersion"></xref> that is the maximum version allowed in the response.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.Services.Common.DataServiceProtocolVersion"> </xref> som den maksimale tillatte versjonen som er tillatt i svaret.
